heading: Career
paragraph: I'm currently studying front end web development, diving in technologies like react,vue and svelte and soon plan to enter fullstack development down the line.

heading: Education
paragraph: My school is DPS STS from which I completed my O levels and A levels. I graduated in 2020 and then enrolled into Independent University, Bangladesh around October of 2020 during the pandemic's full swing.

heading: What I love doing
paragraph: Currently I discovered I love designing websites, everything from color to the font-families used to maintain typography. Nothing is more satisfying than seeing a website animate to get ready for interactivity.

heading: My Skills
paragraph: I am proficient in HTML, CSS, NodeJS and currently dipping my toes into React.
